00098 void ChromosomeT< double >::initializeDerandom( double minVal, double maxVal )
00099 {
00100     SIZE_CHECK( size( ) >= 5 )
00101 
00102     unsigned n = ( size( ) - 2 ) / 3;
00103     std::vector< double >::iterator s  = begin( );
00104     std::vector< double >::iterator d  = s + n;
00105     std::vector< double >::iterator r  = d + n;
00106     std::vector< double >::iterator dr = r + n;
00107     std::vector< double >::iterator sr = dr+ 1;
00108 
00109     for( unsigned i = 0; i < n; i++ ) {
00110         //
00111         // kumulierte Zufallsschritte
00112         //
00113         *( s + i ) = 0;
00114 
00115         //
00116         // Schrittweite fuer Mutation der Objektvariablen
00117         //
00118         *( d + i ) = Rng::uni( minVal, maxVal );;
00119 
00120         //
00121         // zu lernende Vorzugsrichtung
00122         //
00123         *( r + i ) = 0;
00124     }
00125 
00126     //
00127     // Schrittweite fuer Mutation der Vorzugsrichtung
00128     //
00129     *dr = Rng::uni( minVal, maxVal );
00130 
00131     //
00132     // kumulierte Schritte (Richtung)
00133     //
00134     *sr = 0;
00135 }

00139 void ChromosomeT< double >::dumpDerandom( std::ostream& os ) const
00140 {
00141     SIZE_CHECK( size( ) >= 5 )
00142 
00143     unsigned i, n = ( size( ) - 2 ) / 3;
00144     std::vector< double >::const_iterator s  = begin( );
00145     std::vector< double >::const_iterator d  = s + n;
00146     std::vector< double >::const_iterator r  = d + n;
00147     std::vector< double >::const_iterator dr = r + n;
00148     std::vector< double >::const_iterator sr = dr+ 1;
00149 
00150     os << "s =";
00151     for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00152         os << '\t' << *( s + i );
00153     os << "\nd =";
00154     for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00155         os << '\t' << *( d + i );
00156     os << "\nr =";
00157     for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00158         os << '\t' << *( r + i );
00159     os << "\ndr =\t" << *dr;
00160     os << "\nsr =\t" << *sr << std::endl;
00161 }

00165 inline unsigned long pow2( unsigned n )
00166 {
00167     return 1UL << n;
00168 }
00169 
00170 void ChromosomeT< double >::decodeBinary( const Chromosome& chrom,
00171                                           const Interval&   range,
00172                                           unsigned          nbits,
00173                                           bool              useGray )
00174 {
00175     SIZE_CHECK( chrom.size( ) % nbits == 0 )
00176 
00177     const std::vector< bool >& src = dynamic_cast< const std::vector< bool >& >( chrom );
00178 
00179     double stepSize = ( pow2( nbits ) - 1 ) / range.width();
00180     unsigned i, j, k;
00181     unsigned long l, m;
00182 
00183     resize( src.size( ) / nbits );
00184 
00185 
00186     for( j = size( ), k = src.size( ); j--; ) {
00187         if( useGray )
00188             for( l = m = 0, i = nbits; i--; )
00189                 l = ( l << 1 ) | ( m ^= ( src[ --k ] ? 1 : 0 ) );
00190         else
00191             for( l = 0, i = nbits; i--; )
00192                 l = ( l << 1 ) | ( src[ --k ] ? 1 : 0 );
00193 
00194         ( *this )[ j ] = l / stepSize + range.lowerBound();
00195     }
00196 }

00200 void ChromosomeT< double >::accumulate( const std::vector< double >& acc, double c )
00201 {
00202     SIZE_CHECK( size( ) == acc.size( ) )
00203 
00204     for( unsigned i = size( ); i--; )
00205         ( *this )[ i ] = ( 1 - c ) * ( *this )[ i ] + c * acc[ i ];
00206 }

00294 
00295 void
00296 ChromosomeT< double >::mutateNormalRotAngles( const std::vector< double >& sigma_sqr,
00297                                               const std::vector< double >& alpha )
00298 {
00299     RANGE_CHECK( sigma_sqr.size( ) > 0 || size( ) == 0 )
00300 
00301     register unsigned m, i, j, k;
00302 
00303     std::vector< double >& v = *this;
00304     std::vector< double > z( v.size( ) );
00305 
00306     //
00307     // create random vector z
00308     //
00309     for( m = 0; m < z.size( ) && m < sigma_sqr.size( ); m++ )
00310         z[ m ] = Rng::gauss( 0, sigma_sqr[ m ] );
00311 
00312     for( ; m < z.size( ); m++ )
00313         z[ m ] = Rng::gauss( 0, sigma_sqr[ sigma_sqr.size( ) - 1 ] );
00314 
00315     //
00316     // rotate vector z
00317     //
00318     for( k = 0, j = 1; j < m && k < alpha.size( ); j++ )
00319         for( i = 0; i < m-j && k < alpha.size( ); i++, k++ ) {
00320             double sina = sin( alpha[ k ] );
00321             double cosa = cos( alpha[ k ] );
00322             double t    = cosa * z[ i ] - sina * z[ i + j ];
00323             z[ i + j ]  = sina * z[ i ] + cosa * z[ i + j ];
00324             z[ i     ]  = t;
00325         }
00326 
00327     //
00328     // mutate *this with rotated random vector z
00329     //
00330     for( m = v.size( ); m--; )
00331         v[ m ] += z[ m ];
00332 }

00336 void ChromosomeT< double >::mutateLogNormal( double overallVariance,
00337                                              double indivVariance )
00338 {
00339     double overall = Rng::gauss( 0, overallVariance );
00340 
00341     for( unsigned i = size( ); i--; )
00342         ( *this )[ i ] *= exp( overall + Rng::gauss( 0, indivVariance ) );
00343 }

00346 
00347 void ChromosomeT< double >::mutateDerandom( std::vector< double >& v,
00348                                             const DerandomConst& K )
00349 {
00350     SIZE_CHECK( v.size( ) == 3 * size( ) + 2 )
00351 
00352     unsigned n = size( );
00353     std::vector< double >::iterator s  = v.begin( );
00354     std::vector< double >::iterator d  = s + n;
00355     std::vector< double >::iterator r  = d + n;
00356     std::vector< double >::iterator dr = r + n;
00357     std::vector< double >::iterator sr = dr+ 1;
00358 
00359     unsigned i;
00360     double   z, zr, globalFac, sum;
00361     std::vector< double > y( *this );
00362 
00363     zr = Rng::gauss( 0, 1 );
00364 
00365     for( sum = 0, i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ) {
00366 
00367         //
00368         // create random step
00369         //
00370         z = Rng::gauss( 0, 1 );
00371 
00372         //
00373         // mutate object variables
00374         //
00375         ( *this )[ i ] += *( d + i ) * z + *dr * zr * *( r + i );
00376 
00377         //
00378         // accumulate step sizes
00379         //
00380         *( s + i ) = ( 1-K.C ) * *( s + i ) + K.C * ( K.Cu*z );
00381         sum += *( s + i ) * *( s + i );
00382     }
00383 
00384     //
00385     // step size factor
00386     //
00387     globalFac = exp( K.Beta * ( sqrt( sum ) - K.ChiN ) );
00388 
00389     //
00390     // mutate step sizes
00391     //
00392     for( i = 0; i < size( ); i++ )
00393         *( d + i ) *= globalFac * exp( K.BetaI * ( fabs(*(s+i)) - K.Chi1 ) );
00394 
00395     //
00396     // accumulate direction
00397     //
00398     *sr = std::max( ( 1-K.C ) * *sr + K.C * ( K.Cu*zr ), 0. );
00399 
00400     //
00401     // mutate step width for direction
00402     //
00403     for( sum = 0, i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ) {
00404         y[ i ] = ( 1-K.Crr ) * *dr * *(r+i) + K.Crr * ( (*this)[i]-y[i] );
00405         sum += y[ i ] * y[ i ];
00406     }
00407 
00408     //
00409     // normalize direction vector
00410     //
00411     if( ( sum = sqrt( sum ) ) > 0 )
00412         for( i = 0; i < size( ); i++ )
00413             *( r + i ) = y[ i ] / sum;
00414 
00415     for( sum = 0, i = 0; i < size( ); i++ )
00416         sum += *( d + i ) * *( d + i );
00417 
00418     sum = sqrt( sum ) / 3;
00419 
00420     *dr *= exp( K.BetaR * ( fabs( *sr ) - K.Chi1 ) );
00421     if( *dr < sum ) *dr = sum;
00422 }

00434 void
00435 ChromosomeT< double >::recombineIntermediate( const Chromosome& dadChrom,
00436                                               const Chromosome& momChrom )
00437 {
00438     SIZE_CHECK( dadChrom.size( ) == momChrom.size( ) )
00439 
00440     const std::vector< double >& dad = dynamic_cast< const std::vector< double >& >( dadChrom );
00441     const std::vector< double >& mom = dynamic_cast< const std::vector< double >& >( momChrom );
00442 
00443     resize( dad.size( ) );
00444 
00445     for( unsigned i = size( ); i--; )
00446         ( *this )[ i ] = ( dad[ i ] + mom[ i ] ) / 2.;
00447 }

00500 //===========================================================================
00501 //
00502 // generalized intermediate recombination
00503 //
00504 void ChromosomeT< double >::recombineGenIntermediate( Chromosome& mate )
00505 {
00506     SIZE_CHECK( size( ) == mate.size( ) )
00507 
00508     std::vector< double >& v = *this;
00509     std::vector< double >& w = dynamic_cast< std::vector< double >& >( mate );
00510 
00511     for( unsigned i = v.size( ); i--; ) {
00512         double a = v[ i ];
00513         double b = w[ i ];
00514         v[ i ] = Rng::uni( a, b );
00515         w[ i ] = Rng::uni( a, b );
00516     }
00517 }

00534 //===========================================================================
00535 
00536 #ifdef OLD_STUFF
00537 
00538 //
00539 // cf. B. Sendhoff & M. Kreutz: Analysis of possible genome-dependence of
00540 //     mutation rates in Genetic Algorithms.
00541 //     Evolutionary Computing - selected papers from the 1996 AISB workshop,
00542 //     vol. 1134 of Lecture Notes in Computer Science, T. Fogarty, ed.,
00543 //     pp. 257-269, Springer Verlag, Berlin, September 1996.
00544 //
00545 
00546 static double a( long i, double s )
00547 {
00548     const unsigned Nk = 6;
00549     static double k[ 2 ][ Nk ] = {
00550         {  0.5437, -0.3672, -0.0634,  0.6627, -0.5034,  0.0021 },
00551         {  0.0043,  0.1677, -0.2843,  0.0073,  1.1447, -0.8107 }
00552     };
00553 
00554     unsigned j;
00555     double l, logs, sum = 0.0;
00556 
00557     logs = log( 1 + 1 / s ) / Ln2;
00558 
00559     for( j = 0, l = 1.; j < Nk; j++, l *= logs )
00560         sum += k[ i ][ j ] * l;
00561 
00562     return sum;
00563 }
00564 
00565 static inline double q1( double i, double a1, double a2 )
00566 {
00567     register double pow2mi1 = pow( 2., -i - 1 );
00568 
00569     return a1 * ( 1 - pow2mi1 )
00570          - a2 * ( i*i - 2 * i + 3 - 6 * pow2mi1 );
00571 }
00572 
00573 static double q2( double x, double y )
00574 {
00575     return 0.5 * x * exp( -y )
00576          +   2 * x * exp( - 4 * y )
00577          +   8 * x * exp( -16 * y );
00578 }
00579 
00580 static inline double Pd( double i, double a1, double a2 )
00581 {
00582     double p = ( a1 - a2 * i * i );
00583     return p > 0 ? p : 0;
00584 }
00585 
00586 static inline double Pc( double i, double a1, double a2 )
00587 {
00588     double sqrt_a1a2 = sqrt( fabs( a1 / a2 ) );
00589 
00590     if( i > sqrt_a1a2 )
00591         return q1( sqrt_a1a2, a1, a2 ) * exp( -Ln2 * ( i - sqrt_a1a2 ) );
00592     else
00593         return q1( i, a1, a2 );
00594 }
00595 
00596 static inline double P( double i, double a1, double a2, double step )
00597 {
00598     if( i == 0 )
00599         return a1; // Pd( 0, a1, a2 );
00600     else {
00601         double pd = Pd( i,      a1, a2 );
00602         double pc = Pc( i-step, a1, a2 );
00603         return pd * ( 1 - pc ) + pc * ( 1- pd );
00604     }
00605 }
00606 
00607 void ChromosomeT< double >::stdDevToMutationRates( double stdDev, double rate )
00608 {
00609     const unsigned NBits = 10;
00610     register unsigned  i;
00611     double eta, a1, a2, c1, c2, p1, p2, qq2, id, pow2i, step;
00612 
00613     eta = 0.4577 - 0.5052 * sqr( 1 - stdDev );
00614     a1  = a( 0, stdDev );
00615     a2  = a( 1, stdDev );
00616     c1  = 2 / ( sqrt( 2 * Pi ) * stdDev );
00617     c2  = sqr( ( 1 + eta ) / ( Sqrt2 * stdDev ) );
00618 
00619     if( stdDev < 1 ) qq2 = q2( c1, c2 );
00620 
00621     std::vector< double >& p = *this;
00622     step = p.size( ) > NBits
00623         ? double( NBits ) / p.size( ) : 1.;
00624 
00625     for( i = 0; i < p.size( ); i++ ) {
00626         id = i * step;
00627         if( stdDev < 1 ) {
00628             if( i == 0 )
00629                 p[ i ] = c1 * exp( -c2 );
00630             else {
00631                 pow2i  = pow( 2., id );
00632                 p1     = c1 * pow2i * exp( -c2 * pow2i * pow2i );
00633                 p2     = qq2 / pow2i;
00634                 p[ i ] = p1 * ( 1 - p2 ) + p2 * ( 1 - p1 );
00635             }
00636         } else {
00637             if( i == 0 )
00638                 p[ i ] = a1;
00639             else
00640                 p[ i ] = P( id, a1, a2, step );
00641         }
00642     }
00643 
00644     //
00645     // scale p[ i ]
00646     //
00647     double sum = 0.;
00648     for( i = 0; i < p.size( ); i++ )
00649         sum += p[ i ];
00650     rate /= sum;
00651     for( i = 0; i < p.size( ); i++ )
00652         p[ i ] *= rate;
00653 }
00654 
00655 #endif // OLD_STUFF

00667 //=============================================================
00668              
00669 void ChromosomeT< double >::initializeGSA( const std::vector< double >& 
00670                                            sigma, int baseSize )
00671 {
00672 
00673   int i,j,dim;
00674   dim = int( ((  *this ).size() - 1. ) / double( baseSize ) );
00675   
00676   (* this)[ 0 ] = sigma[ 0 ];
00677 
00678   for (j=0; j<baseSize; j++)
00679     for (i=0; i<dim; i++) 
00680       (* this)[ j*dim + i + 1 ] = sigma[ j*dim + i + 1];
00681 
00682 }
00683 
00684 
00685 //=============================================================
00686              
00687 void ChromosomeT< double >::initializeGSA( double SigmaMin, double SigmaMax,
00688                                            int baseSize )
00689 {
00690 
00691   int i,j,dim;
00692   dim = int( ((  *this ).size() - 1. ) / double( baseSize ) );
00693   
00694   (* this)[ 0 ] = Rng::uni( SigmaMin, SigmaMax);
00695   
00696   for (j=0; j<baseSize; j++)
00697     for (i=0; i<dim; i++) {
00698       if (j) (* this)[ j*dim + i + 1 ] = Rng::gauss(0, 1./dim );
00699       else (* this)[ j*dim + i + 1 ] = 0;
00700     }
00701 }

00704 
00705 void ChromosomeT< double >::mutateGSA( ChromosomeT<double> & sigma )
00706 {
00707   int Dimension   = ( *this ).size();
00708   int baseSize    = int( (sigma.size()-1)/(Dimension*1.0) );
00709   double beta     = 1. / sqrt( (double)Dimension );
00710   double cu       = sqrt( (2.-beta)/beta );
00711   double cm       = 1. / sqrt( (double)baseSize ) * ( 1. + 1./baseSize );
00712   double xi_const = 1.5;
00713 
00714   mutateGSA( sigma, beta, xi_const, cu, cm );
00715 
00716 }
00717 
00718 //=============================================================
00719 
00720 void ChromosomeT< double >::mutateGSA( ChromosomeT<double> & sigma,
00721                                                 double beta,
00722                                                 double xi_const, double cu,
00723                                                 double cm )
00724 {
00725   
00726   int Dimension   = ( *this ).size();
00727   int baseSize    = int( (sigma.size()-1)/(Dimension*1.0) );
00728   double xi, *zet, **be, *ueps;
00729   int i,j;
00730   
00731   zet  = new double  [ baseSize ];
00732   ueps = new double  [ Dimension ];
00733   be   = new double* [ baseSize ];
00734   for (i=0; i < baseSize; i++) be[ i ] = new double [ Dimension ];
00735   
00736   if ( Rng::coinToss( 0.5 ) ) xi = xi_const;
00737   else xi = 1. / xi_const;
00738   
00739   // set the random vector z and for convenience copy the
00740   // sigma values from dad to a proper matrix B
00741   for (j=0; j < baseSize; j++ ) {
00742     zet[ j ] = Rng::gauss(0,1);
00743     for (i=0; i < Dimension; i++ )
00744       be[ j ][ i ] = sigma[ j * Dimension + i + 1 ];
00745   }
00746   
00747   for (i=0; i<Dimension; i++) {
00748     for (j=0, ueps[ i ] = 0; j < baseSize; j++ )
00749       ueps[ i ] += cm * ( zet[ j ] * be[ j ][ i ] );
00750   }
00751 
00752   // adaptation of the object variable
00753   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) {
00754     ( *this )[ i ] += sigma[ 0 ] * xi * ueps[ i ];
00755   }
00756   
00757   // adaptation of the strategy variable
00758   // the global parameter firscht
00759   sigma[ 0 ]    = sigma[ 0 ] * pow( xi, beta );
00760   // the generating set b1,...,bm
00761   for (j=0; j < baseSize; j++ ) {
00762     for (i=0; i<Dimension; i++)
00763       if ( j ) sigma[ j * Dimension + i + 1 ] = be[ j-1 ][ i ];
00764       else sigma[ i + 1 ] = (1 - beta)*be[ 0 ][ i ] +
00765              beta*cu*xi*ueps[ i ];
00766   }
00767 
00768   delete[ ] zet;
00769   delete[ ] ueps;
00770   for (i=0; i < baseSize; i++) delete [ ] be[ i ]; 
00771   delete [ ] be;
00772 
00773 }  
00774 
00775 //=============================================================
00776 
00777 void ChromosomeT< double >::initializeIDA( const ChromosomeT< double >&
00778                                                     sigma )
00779 {
00780 
00781   initializeIDA( static_cast< const std::vector< double >& >( sigma ) );
00782   
00783 }
00784 //=============================================================
00785              
00786 void ChromosomeT< double >::initializeIDA( const std::vector< double >& 
00787                                                     sigma )
00788 {
00789 
00790   int i;
00791   
00792   for (i=0; i< int(sigma.size()); i++) (* this)[ i ] = sigma[ i ];
00793 
00794 }
00795 
00796 //=============================================================
00797 
00798 void ChromosomeT< double >::initializeIDA( double SigmaMin, 
00799                                                     double SigmaMax )
00800 {
00801   
00802   int i, dim;
00803 
00804   dim = int( ( (* this).size() - 2)/3. );
00805   // step size delta_r
00806   (* this)[ 0 ] = Rng::uni( SigmaMin, SigmaMax );
00807   // cumulation direction
00808   (* this)[ 2*dim + 1 ] = 0;
00809   // individual step size delta_i 
00810   for (i = 0; i<dim; i++) (* this)[ i + 1 ] = Rng::uni( SigmaMin, SigmaMax );
00811   // direction vector
00812   for (i = 0; i<dim; i++) (* this)[ dim + i + 1 ];
00813   // accumulated individual steps
00814   for (i = 0; i<dim; i++) (* this)[ 2*dim + i + 2 ];
00815 }
00816 
00817 //=============================================================
00818 
00819 //#ifndef _WIN32 // fatal error C1001: INTERNER COMPILER-FEHLER
00820 
00821 void ChromosomeT< double >::mutateIDA( ChromosomeT<double> & sigma ) {
00822 
00823   int Dimension   = ( *this ).size();
00824   double c        = 1. / sqrt( (double) Dimension );
00825   double c_r      = 3. / Dimension;
00826   double beta     = 2. / Dimension;
00827   double beta_ind = 1. / (4.*Dimension);
00828   double beta_r   = 1. / sqrt(4.*Dimension);
00829   double cu       = sqrt( (2.-c)/c );
00830   double xi       = 1/3.;
00831 
00832   mutateIDA( sigma, c, c_r, beta, beta_ind, beta_r, cu, xi );
00833 
00834 }
00835 
00836 //=============================================================
00837 
00838 void ChromosomeT< double >::mutateIDA( ChromosomeT<double> & sigma, 
00839                                                 double c, 
00840                                                 double c_r, double beta, 
00841                                                 double beta_ind, double beta_r, 
00842                                                 double cu, double xi ) {
00843   
00844   int Dimension   = ( *this ).size();
00845   double chi_n    = sqrt( (double)Dimension )*( 1 - 1. / (4.*Dimension)
00846                                               +  1. / (21.*sqr((double)Dimension)) );
00847   double chi_1    = sqrt( 2. / 3.141592654 );
00848     
00849   double aux, delta_r, s_r, zet_r, s_rN, delta_rN;
00850   double Norm_sN_vec, Norm_rN_vec, Norm_deltaN_vec;
00851   double *delta, *deltaN, *r, *rN, *s, *sN, *zet, *dist;
00852 
00853   int i;
00854   
00855   delta  = new double[ Dimension ];
00856   deltaN = new double[ Dimension ];
00857   s      = new double[ Dimension ];
00858   sN     = new double[ Dimension ];
00859   r      = new double[ Dimension ];
00860   rN     = new double[ Dimension ];
00861   zet    = new double[ Dimension ];
00862   dist   = new double[ Dimension ];
00863 
00864   // this stuff here is very close to (Hansen, 1995), the sections and
00865   // equations are given whenever appropriate, we do not give them if
00866   // it is not appropriate because that would be a waste of time and
00867   // we don't wanna do that now , do we...
00868   // extract the relevant variables from sigma
00869   delta_r = sigma[ 0 ];
00870   s_r     = sigma[ 2*Dimension + 1 ] ;
00871   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) delta[ i ] = sigma[ i + 1 ];
00872   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) r[ i ]     = sigma[ Dimension + i + 1 ];
00873   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) s[ i ]     = sigma[ 2*Dimension + i + 2 ];
00874 
00875   // everything marked with an N stands for N as in offspriNg :-)
00876   // adaptation of the object variable (2.5.2 - 1.)
00877   zet_r   = Rng::gauss(0,1);
00878   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) {
00879     zet   [ i ]  =  Rng::gauss(0,1);
00880     dist  [ i ]  = delta[ i ] * zet[ i ] + zet_r * delta_r * r[ i ];
00881     ( *this )[ i ] += dist[ i ];
00882   }
00883 
00884   // adaptation of the individual step sizes (2.5.2 - 2.1.)
00885   for (i = 0, Norm_sN_vec = 0; i<Dimension; i++) {
00886     sN[ i ]     = (1.-c) * s[ i ] + c * cu * zet[ i ];
00887     Norm_sN_vec += sqr(sN[ i ]);
00888   }
00889   Norm_sN_vec = sqrt( Norm_sN_vec );
00890   // adaptation of the individual step sizes (2.5.2 - 2.2.)
00891   for (i = 0, Norm_deltaN_vec = 0; i<Dimension; i++) {
00892     deltaN[ i ] = delta[ i ] * exp( beta * ( Norm_sN_vec - chi_n) ) *  
00893       exp( beta_ind * ( fabs( sN[ i ] ) - chi_1  ) );
00894     Norm_deltaN_vec += sqr( deltaN[ i ] );
00895   }
00896   Norm_deltaN_vec = sqrt( Norm_deltaN_vec );
00897   
00898   // direction adaptation (2.5.2 - 3.1.)
00899   aux = (1.-c) * s_r + c * cu * zet_r;
00900   if (aux > 0) s_rN = aux; else s_rN = 0;
00901   // direction adaptation (2.5.2 - 3.2.)
00902   for (i = 0, Norm_rN_vec = 0; i<Dimension; i++) {
00903     rN[ i ]     = (1.-c_r) * r[ i ] * delta_r
00904       + c_r * dist[ i ];
00905     Norm_rN_vec += sqr(rN[ i ]);
00906   }
00907   Norm_rN_vec = sqrt( Norm_rN_vec );
00908   // direction adaptation (2.5.2 - 3.3.)
00909   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) rN[ i ]     = rN[ i ] / Norm_rN_vec;
00910   // direction adaptation (2.5.2 - 3.4.)
00911   aux = delta_r * exp( beta_r * ( fabs( s_rN ) - chi_1 ) );
00912   if (aux > (Norm_deltaN_vec * xi) ) delta_rN = aux;
00913   else delta_rN = Norm_deltaN_vec/3.;
00914   
00915   // and now we write all the little Ns back into the big, big
00916   // sigma chromosome ...
00917   sigma[ 0 ] = delta_rN;
00918   sigma[ 2*Dimension + 1 ] = s_rN ;
00919   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) sigma[ i + 1 ] = deltaN[ i ];
00920   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) sigma[ Dimension + i + 1 ] = rN[ i ];
00921   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) sigma[ 2*Dimension + i + 2 ] = sN[ i ];
00922 
00923   delete[ ] zet;
00924   delete[ ] deltaN;
00925   delete[ ] delta;
00926   delete[ ] s;
00927   delete[ ] sN;
00928   delete[ ] r;
00929   delete[ ] rN;
00930   delete[ ] dist;
00931 }
00932 //#endif
00933 
00934 //=============================================================
00935 
00936 void ChromosomeT< double >::mutateRotate( ChromosomeT<double> & sigma ) 
00937 {
00938   int    Dimension   = ( *this ).size();  
00939   double epsi       = 0.0001;
00940   int    sigmaCheck = 0;
00941   double tau1       = 1. / sqrt( 2.* Dimension );
00942   double tau2       = 1. / sqrt( 2.* sqrt( Dimension*1.0 ) );
00943   double beta       = 0.0873;
00944 
00945   mutateRotate( sigma, tau1, tau2, beta, sigmaCheck, epsi );
00946   
00947 }
00948   
00949 //=============================================================
00950 
00951 void ChromosomeT< double >::mutateRotate( ChromosomeT<double> & sigma_sqr,
00952                                           double tau1, double tau2,
00953                                           double beta, int sigmaCheck,
00954                                           double epsi)
00955 
00956 {
00957 
00958   int    Dimension   = ( *this ).size();  
00959   double alpha = 0, *s, *ss, rdno;
00960   
00961   int i, j, k, index = 0, sign_of_sigma;
00962 
00963   s       = new double[ Dimension ];
00964   ss      = new double[ Dimension ];
00965 
00966   // here the adaptation parameters are mutated first!
00967   rdno = Rng::gauss(0,1);
00968   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) {
00969     sigma_sqr[ i ] *= exp( tau1 * rdno + tau2 * Rng::gauss(0,1) );
00970     // check that sigma is not too small!
00971     if ( (sigmaCheck) && (sigma_sqr[ i ] < epsi*fabs(( *this )[ i ])) )
00972       sigma_sqr[ i ] = epsi*fabs(( *this )[ i ]);
00973   }
00974   for (i = 0; i<Dimension-1; i++) {
00975     for (j = i+1; j<Dimension; j++) {
00976       index = int( Dimension*(i+1) -i-1+j -0.5*i*(i+1) );
00977       sigma_sqr[ index ] += beta * Rng::gauss(0,1);
00978       // check that angles are within limits!
00979       if ( fabs( sigma_sqr[ index ] ) > 3.141592654 ) {
00980         if (sigma_sqr[ index ]>=0) sign_of_sigma=1; else sign_of_sigma=-1;
00981         sigma_sqr[ index ] = sigma_sqr[ index ] - 2 * 3.141592654
00982           * sign_of_sigma;
00983       }
00984     }
00985   }
00986   
00987   // draw rd. numbers according to sigma values!
00988   for (k = 0; k< Dimension; k++)  
00989   {
00990     s[ k ] = Rng::gauss(0, sigma_sqr[ k ] );
00991     ss[k]  = 0;
00992   }
00993 
00994   // do the funny rotation bits!
00995   for (i = 0; i<Dimension-1; i++) {
00996     for (j = i+1; j<Dimension; j++) {
00997       for (k = 0; k< Dimension; k++) {
00998         alpha = sigma_sqr[ int( Dimension*(i+1) -i-1+j -0.5*i*(i+1) ) ];
00999         if (i==k) 
01000             ss[ k ] = s[ k ] * cos(alpha ) - s[ j ] * sin( alpha );
01001         else 
01002         if (j==k) 
01003             ss[ k ] = s[ i ] * sin( alpha )+s[ k ] * cos( alpha );
01004         else 
01005             ss[k] = s[k];
01006       }
01007       for(k=0; k<Dimension; k++) s[k]=ss[k];
01008     }
01009   }
01010   
01011   // change the objective parameters
01012   for (i = 0; i< Dimension; i++)
01013     ( *this )[ i ] += s[ i ];
01014   
01015   delete[ ] s;
01016   delete[ ] ss;
01017 }
01018 
01019 //=============================================================
01020 
01021 void ChromosomeT< double >::initializeRotate( double SigmaMin,
01022                                               double SigmaMax )      
01023 {
01024   int i, j;
01025   int Dimension = int( -0.5 + sqrt( 0.25 + 2*( *this ).size()) );
01026   
01027   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++)
01028     ( *this )[ i ] = Rng::uni( SigmaMin, SigmaMax );;
01029   
01030   for (i = 0; i<Dimension-1; i++) 
01031     for (j = i+1; j<Dimension; j++) 
01032       ( *this )[ int( Dimension*(i+1) -i-1+j -0.5*i*(i+1) ) ] = 0;
01033       
01034 }
01035 
01036 //=============================================================
01037 
01038 void ChromosomeT< double >::initializeRotate( const ChromosomeT< double >&
01039                                               sigma )
01040 {
01041 
01042   initializeIDA( static_cast< const std::vector< double >& >( sigma ) );
01043   
01044 }
01045 //=============================================================
01046              
01047 void ChromosomeT< double >::initializeRotate( const std::vector< double >& 
01048                                               sigma )
01049 {
01050 
01051   int i;
01052   
01053   for (i=0; i< int(sigma.size()); i++) (* this)[ i ] = sigma[ i ];
01054 
01055 }

01057 //=============================================================
01058 
01059 void ChromosomeT< double >::mutateCMA( ChromosomeT<double> & sigma )
01060 {
01061   int Dimension   = (* this).size();
01062   double c        = 1. / sqrt( (double)Dimension );
01063   double cu       = sqrt( (2.-c) * c );
01064   double beta     = 1. / Dimension;
01065   double ccov     = 2. / sqr( (double)Dimension );
01066 
01067   mutateCMA( sigma, c, cu, ccov, beta );
01068   
01069 }
01070 
01071 //=============================================================
01072 
01073 void ChromosomeT< double >::mutateCMA( ChromosomeT<double> & sigma,
01074                                              double c, double cu,
01075                                              double ccov, double beta )
01076 {
01077   
01078   int Dimension   = (* this).size();
01079   double chi_n    = sqrt( (double)Dimension )*( 1 - 1. / (4.*Dimension)
01080                                         +  1. / (21.*sqr((double)Dimension)) );
01081   
01082   double delta, *s, *zet, *sN, deltaN, norm, normS;
01083   double *sDelta, *sDeltaN;
01084   
01085   int i, j;
01086 
01087   Array< double > B         ( Dimension, Dimension );
01088   Array< double > Bdelta    ( Dimension, Dimension );
01089   Array< double > C         ( Dimension, Dimension );
01090   Array< double > lambda    ( Dimension );
01091   Array< double > prod      ( Dimension );
01092   Array< double > prodDelta ( Dimension );
01093 
01094   s       = new double[ Dimension ];
01095   zet     = new double[ Dimension ];
01096   sN      = new double[ Dimension ];
01097   sDelta  = new double[ Dimension ];
01098   sDeltaN = new double[ Dimension ];
01099   
01100   delta = sigma[ 0 ];
01101   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) {
01102     zet   [ i ] = Rng::gauss(0,1);
01103     s     [ i ] = sigma[ i + 1];
01104     sDelta[ i ] = sigma[ Dimension + i + 1];
01105     for (j = 0; j<Dimension; j++)
01106       C(i, j) = sigma[ (i+2)*Dimension + j + 1 ];
01107   }
01108 
01109   eigensymm( C, B, lambda );
01110   
01111   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) {
01112     for (j = 0, norm = 0; j<Dimension; j++) norm += sqr( B(j, i) );
01113     norm = sqrt( norm );
01114     for (j = 0; j<Dimension; j++) {
01115       Bdelta(j, i) = B(j, i) / norm;
01116       B     (j, i) = sqrt( fabs(lambda( i ))) * Bdelta(j, i);
01117     }
01118   }
01119     
01120   // change the objective parameters
01121   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) {
01122     for (j = 0, prod( i ) = 0, prodDelta( i ) = 0; j<Dimension; j++) {
01123       prod     ( i ) += B     (i,j) * zet[ j ];
01124       prodDelta( i ) += Bdelta(i,j) * zet[ j ];
01125     }
01126     (* this)[ i ] += delta * prod( i );
01127   }
01128 
01129   // change the adaptation parameters
01130   for (i = 0, normS = 0; i<Dimension; i++) {
01131     sN[ i ]      = (1 - c) * s[ i ]      + cu * prod( i );
01132     sDeltaN[ i ] = (1 - c) * sDelta[ i ] + cu * prodDelta( i );
01133     normS += sqr( sDeltaN[ i ] );
01134   }
01135   normS  = sqrt( normS );
01136   deltaN = delta * exp( beta * ( normS - chi_n ) );
01137   // change the covariance matrix
01138   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) 
01139     for (j = 0; j<Dimension; j++) 
01140       C(i, j ) = ( 1 - ccov ) * C(i, j) + ccov * sN[ i ] * sN[ j ];
01141   
01142   // write the stuff back!
01143   sigma[ 0 ] = deltaN;
01144   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) {
01145     sigma[ i + 1 ] = sN[ i ];
01146     sigma[ i + 1 + Dimension] = sDeltaN[ i ];
01147     for (j = 0; j<Dimension; j++)
01148       sigma[ (i+2)*Dimension + j + 1 ] = C(i, j);
01149   }
01150 
01151   delete[ ] zet;
01152   delete[ ] sDelta;
01153   delete[ ] sDeltaN;
01154   delete[ ] s;
01155   delete[ ] sN;
01156   
01157 }
01158 
01159 //=============================================================
01160 
01161 void ChromosomeT< double >::initializeCMA( double SigmaMin,
01162                                            double SigmaMax  )      
01163 {
01164   int i, j;
01165 
01166   int Dimension = int ( -1 + sqrt( (double) (( *this ).size() )) );
01167   
01168   ( *this )[ 0 ] = Rng::uni( SigmaMin, SigmaMax );
01169   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) {
01170     ( *this )[ i + 1 ] = 0;
01171     ( *this )[ Dimension + i + 1 ] = 0;
01172     for (j = 0; j<Dimension; j++)
01173       if (i!=j) ( *this )[ (i+2)*Dimension + j + 1 ] = 0;
01174       else ( *this )[ (i+2)*Dimension + j + 1 ] = 1;
01175   }
01176 }
01177 
01178 //=============================================================
01179 
01180 void ChromosomeT< double >::initializeCMA( const ChromosomeT< double >&
01181                                            sigma )
01182 {
01183 
01184   initializeIDA( static_cast< const std::vector< double >& >( sigma ) );
01185   
01186 }
01187 //=============================================================
01188              
01189 void ChromosomeT< double >::initializeCMA( const std::vector< double >& 
01190                                            sigma )
01191 {
01192 
01193   int i;
01194   
01195   for (i=0; i< int(sigma.size()); i++) (* this)[ i ] = sigma[ i ];
01196 
01197 }

01199 //=============================================================
01200 
01201 void ChromosomeT< double >::mutateMSR( double xi_prob )
01202 {
01203   
01204   int    Dimension   = ( *this ).size();
01205   double xi;
01206   
01207   // here the adaptation parameters are mutated!
01208   for (int i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) {
01209     if (Rng::coinToss( xi_prob )) xi = 1.5;
01210     else xi = 1/1.5;
01211     ( *this )[ i ] *= xi;
01212   }
01213   
01214 }

01218 void ChromosomeT< double >::showRotate( )
01219 {
01220 
01221   int i, j;
01222   
01223   int n   = int( ( *this ).size() );
01224   int dim = int( - 0.5 + sqrt( 2.0 * n + 0.25 ) );
01225   
01226   std::cout << "sigma       = ";
01227   for (i = 0; i<dim; i++)
01228           std::cout << ( *this )[ i ] << "  ";
01229   std::cout << std::endl;
01230   std::cout << "alpha       = ";
01231   for (i = 0; i<dim-1; i++) {
01232     for (j = i+1; j<dim; j++) {
01233                 std::cout << ( *this )[ int( dim*(i+1) -i-1+j -0.5*i*(i+1) ) ] << "  ";
01234     }
01235         std::cout << std::endl << "             ";
01236   }
01237   std::cout << std::endl;
01238 
01239 }

01245

01247   int n   = int( ( *this ).size() );

01249

01251   std::cout << "s       = ";
01252   for (i = 0; i<dim; i++)
01253           std::cout << ( *this )[ i + 1 ] << "  ";
01254   std::cout << std::endl;

01257           std::cout << ( *this )[ i + dim + 1 ] << "  ";

01267

01295 void ChromosomeT< double >::showGSA( int baseSize) 
01296 {
01297 
01298         int i, j, dim;
01299         std::cout << "global step size = " << ( *this )[ 0 ] << std::endl;
01300         dim = int( ((  *this ).size() - 1. ) / double( baseSize ) );
01301   
01302         for (j = 0; j < baseSize; j++)
01303         {
01304                 std::cout << "base vector " << j << std::endl;
01305                 for (i = 0; i < dim; i++) 
01306                         std::cout << "( " << i << ", " <<
01307                 ( *this )[ dim * j + i + 1 ] << " )  ";
01308                 std::cout << std::endl;
01309         }

01312 //=============================================================
01313 
01314 void ChromosomeT< double >::initializeIDAiso( const ChromosomeT< double >& sigma )
01315 {
01316 
01317   initializeIDAiso( static_cast< const std::vector< double >& >( sigma ) );
01318   
01319 }
01320 //=============================================================
01321              
01322 void ChromosomeT< double >::initializeIDAiso( const std::vector< double >& sigma )
01323 {
01324 
01325   int i, dim;
01326   dim = size() / 2;
01327   
01328   for (i = 0; i < int(sigma.size()); i++) (* this)[ i ] = sigma[ i ];
01329 }
01330 
01331 //=============================================================
01332 
01333 void ChromosomeT< double >::initializeIDAiso( double SigmaMin, 
01334                                               double SigmaMax )
01335 {
01336   
01337   int i, dim;
01338 
01339   dim = size() / 2;
01340 
01341   // individual step size delta_i 
01342   for (i = 0; i<dim; i++) (* this)[ i ] = Rng::uni( SigmaMin, SigmaMax );
01343   // direction vector
01344   for (i = 0; i<dim; i++) (* this)[ dim + i ] = 0.;
01345 }
01346 
01347 //=============================================================
01348 
01349 void ChromosomeT< double >::mutateIDAiso( ChromosomeT<double> & sigma ) {
01350 
01351   int Dimension   = ( *this ).size();
01352   double c        = 1. / sqrt( (double)Dimension );
01353   double beta     = 2. / Dimension;
01354   double beta_ind = 1. / (4.*Dimension);
01355   double cu       = sqrt( (2.-c)/c );
01356 
01357   mutateIDAiso( sigma, c, beta, beta_ind, cu );
01358 
01359 }
01360 
01361 //=============================================================
01362 
01363 void ChromosomeT< double >::mutateIDAiso( ChromosomeT<double> & sigma, 
01364                                           double c, 
01365                                           double beta, 
01366                                           double beta_ind, 
01367                                           double cu ) {
01368   
01369   int Dimension   = size();
01370   double chi_n    = sqrt( (double)Dimension )*( 1 - 1. / (4. * Dimension)
01371                                         +  1. / (21. * sqr((double)Dimension)) );
01372   double chi_1    = sqrt( 2. / 3.141592654 );
01373     
01374   double Norm_sN_vec;
01375   double *delta, *deltaN, *r, *rN, *s, *sN, *zet, *dist;
01376 
01377   int i;
01378   
01379   delta  = new double[ Dimension ];
01380   deltaN = new double[ Dimension ];
01381   s      = new double[ Dimension ];
01382   sN     = new double[ Dimension ];
01383   r      = new double[ Dimension ];
01384   rN     = new double[ Dimension ];
01385   zet    = new double[ Dimension ];
01386   dist   = new double[ Dimension ];
01387 
01388   // this stuff here is very close to (Hansen, 1995), the sections and
01389   // equations are given whenever appropriate, we do not give them if
01390   // it is not appropriate because that would be a waste of time and
01391   // we don't wanna do that now , do we...
01392   // extract the relevant variables from sigma
01393   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) delta[ i ] = sigma[ i  ];
01394   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) s[ i ]     = sigma[ Dimension + i ];
01395 
01396 
01397   // everything marked with an N stands for N as in offspriNg :-)
01398   // adaptation of the object variable (2.5.2 - 1.)
01399   for (i = 0; i < Dimension; i++) {
01400     zet   [ i ]  = Rng::gauss(0,1);
01401     dist  [ i ]  = delta[ i ] * zet[ i ];
01402     ( *this )[ i ] += dist[ i ];
01403   }
01404 
01405   // adaptation of the individual step sizes (2.5.2 - 2.1.)
01406   for (i = 0, Norm_sN_vec = 0; i<Dimension; i++) {
01407     sN[ i ]     = (1.-c) * s[ i ] + c * cu * zet[ i ];
01408     Norm_sN_vec += sqr(sN[ i ]);
01409   }
01410   Norm_sN_vec = sqrt( Norm_sN_vec );
01411   // adaptation of the individual step sizes (2.5.2 - 2.2.)
01412   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) {
01413     deltaN[ i ] = delta[ i ] * exp( beta * ( Norm_sN_vec - chi_n) ) *  
01414       exp( beta_ind * ( fabs( sN[ i ] ) - chi_1  ) );
01415   }
01416   
01417   
01418   // and now we write all the little Ns back into the big, big
01419   // sigma chromosome ...
01420   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) sigma[ i ] = deltaN[ i ];
01421   for (i = 0; i<Dimension; i++) sigma[ Dimension + i ] = sN[ i ];
01422 
01423   delete[ ] zet;
01424   delete[ ] deltaN;
01425   delete[ ] delta;
01426   delete[ ] s;
01427   delete[ ] sN;
01428   delete[ ] r;
01429   delete[ ] rN;
01430   delete[ ] dist;
01431 }

01439 {
01440     os << "ChromosomeT<" << typeid( double ).name( ) << ">(" << size() << ")" << endl;
01441     for( unsigned i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ) {
01442         if( i ) os << '\t';
01443         os << ( *this )[ i ];
01444     }
01445     os << std::endl;

01448 void ChromosomeT< double >::readFrom( std::istream& is )
01449 {
01450     string s;
01451   //is.getline( s );
01452     is >> s;
01453     is.get( );   // skip end of line
01454 
01455     if( is.good( ) &&
01456         s.substr( 0, 12 ) == "ChromosomeT<" &&
01457         s.find( '>' ) != string::npos &&
01458         s.substr( 12, s.find( '>' ) - 12 ) == typeid( double ).name( ) ) {
01459 
01460         resize( atoi( s.substr( s.find( '>' ) + 2 ).c_str( ) ) );
01461         for( unsigned i = 0; i < size( ); i++ )
01462             is >> ( *this )[ i ];
01463     } else

01470 // for unconstrained problems
01471 void ChromosomeT< double >::SBX(ChromosomeT< double >& mate, 
01472                                 double nc, double p) {
01473   unsigned i, n = (*this).size();
01474   double beta, x, u = 0.;
01475 
01476   if(n != mate.size()) {
01477     std::cerr << "SBX is only defined for chromosomes of equal length" 
01478               << std::endl;
01479     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
01480   }
01481 
01482   for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01483     if(Rng::coinToss(p)) {
01484       do { u = Rng::uni(0, 1); } while(u == 1.);
01485       if(u <= .5) 
01486         beta = pow(2 * u, 1. / (nc + 1.)); 
01487       else
01488         beta = pow(1. / (2 - 2 * u), 1. / (nc + 1.)); 
01489       x = ( *this )[i];
01490       ( *this )[i] = .5 * ( (1 + beta) * x + (1 - beta) * mate[i]);
01491       mate[i]    = .5 * ( (1 - beta) * x + (1 + beta) * mate[i]);
01492     }
01493   }
01494 }
01495 
01496 // for constrained problems
01497 void ChromosomeT< double >::SBX(ChromosomeT< double >& mate , 
01498                                 double lower, 
01499                                 double upper, 
01500                                 double nc, double p,
01501                                 double epsilon) {
01502   unsigned i, n = (*this).size();
01503   double beta, betaQ, alpha, expp, y1=0, y2=0, u = 0.;
01504 
01505   if(n != mate.size()) {
01506     std::cerr << "SBX is only defined for chromosomes of equal length" 
01507               << std::endl;
01508     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
01509   }
01510 
01511   for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01512     if(Rng::coinToss(p)) {
01513       if(mate[i] < (*this)[i])
01514         {
01515           y1 = mate[i]; 
01516           y2 = (*this)[i];
01517         }
01518       else
01519         {
01520           y1 = (*this)[i]; 
01521           y2 = mate[i];
01522         }
01523       if(fabs(y2 - y1) > epsilon) 
01524         { //  -> from Deb's implementation, not contained in any paper: prevents division by zero
01525           // Find beta value
01526           if( ( y1 -  lower ) > ( upper - y2 ) ) 
01527             {
01528               beta = 1 + (2*( upper - y2)/( y2 - y1 ));
01529             } else 
01530             {
01531               beta = 1 + (2*( y1 -  lower )/( y2 - y1 ));
01532             }
01533 
01534           expp = (nc + 1.);
01535           beta = 1. / beta;
01536           
01537           // Find alpha
01538           alpha = 2. - pow( beta , expp) ;
01539 
01540           if (alpha < 0.0) 
01541             {
01542               std::cerr << "Error: " << alpha << " " << (*this)[i] << " " <<  mate[i] << std::endl;
01543               exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
01544             }
01545 
01546           expp = 1./expp;
01547 
01548           u = Rng::uni(0, 1);
01549           //  -> from Deb's implementation, not contained in any paper 
01550           // do { u = Rng::uni(0, 1); } while(u == 1.);
01551 
01552           if(u <= 1./alpha) 
01553             {
01554               alpha *= u;
01555               betaQ = pow(alpha, expp); 
01556             }
01557           else
01558             {
01559               alpha *= u;
01560               alpha = 1./( 2. - alpha );
01561               if (alpha < 0.0) 
01562                 {
01563                   std::cerr << "Error: " << alpha << " " << (*this)[i] << " " <<  mate[i] << std::endl;
01564                   exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
01565                 }
01566               betaQ = pow(alpha, expp); 
01567             }
01568         } 
01569       else
01570         { // if genes are equal -> from Deb's implementation, not contained in any paper
01571           betaQ = 1.;
01572         }
01573       
01574       ( *this )[i]   = .5 * ( (y1 + y2) - betaQ * (y2 - y1) );
01575       mate[i]        = .5 * ( (y1 + y2) + betaQ * (y2 - y1) );
01576  
01577       //  -> from Deb's implementation, not contained in any paper
01578       if ( ( *this )[i] < lower) ( *this )[i] = lower;
01579       if ( ( *this )[i] > upper) ( *this )[i] = upper;
01580       if ( mate[i]      < lower) mate[i]      = lower;
01581       if ( mate[i]      > upper) mate[i]      = upper;
01582     }
01583   }
01584 }
01585 // for constrained problems
01586 void ChromosomeT< double >::SBX(ChromosomeT< double >& mate , 
01587                                 std::vector<double > & lower, 
01588                                 std::vector<double > & upper, 
01589                                 double nc, double p,
01590                                 double epsilon) {
01591   unsigned i, n = (*this).size();
01592   double beta, betaQ, alpha, expp, y1=0, y2=0, u = 0.;
01593 
01594   if(n != mate.size()) {
01595     std::cerr << "SBX is only defined for chromosomes of equal length" 
01596               << std::endl;
01597     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
01598   }
01599 
01600   for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01601     if(Rng::coinToss(p)) {
01602       if(mate[i] < (*this)[i])
01603         {
01604           y1 = mate[i]; 
01605           y2 = (*this)[i];
01606         }
01607       else
01608         {
01609           y1 = (*this)[i]; 
01610           y2 = mate[i];
01611         }
01612       if(fabs(y2 - y1) > epsilon) 
01613         { //  -> from Deb's implementation, not contained in any paper: prevents division by zero
01614 
01615           // Find beta value
01616           if((y1 - lower[i]) > ( upper[i] - y2)) 
01617             beta = 1 + (2*( upper[i] - y2)/(y2 - y1));
01618           else 
01619             beta = 1 + (2*( y1 - lower[i] )/(y2 - y1));
01620             
01621 
01622           expp = (nc + 1.);
01623           beta = 1. / beta;
01624           
01625           // Find alpha
01626           alpha = 2. - pow( beta , expp) ;
01627 
01628           if (alpha < 0.0) 
01629             {
01630               std::cerr << "Error: " << alpha << " " << (*this)[i] << " " <<  mate[i] << std::endl;
01631               exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
01632             }
01633 
01634           expp = 1./expp;
01635 
01636           u = Rng::uni(0, 1);
01637 
01638           //  -> from Deb's implementation, not contained in any paper 
01639           // do { u = Rng::uni(0, 1); } while(u == 1.);
01640 
01641           if(u <= 1./alpha) 
01642             {
01643               alpha *= u;
01644               betaQ = pow(alpha, expp); 
01645             }
01646           else
01647             {
01648               alpha *= u;
01649               alpha = 1./( 2. - alpha );
01650               if (alpha < 0.0) 
01651                 {
01652                   std::cerr << "Error: " << alpha << " " << (*this)[i] << " " <<  mate[i] << std::endl;
01653                   exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
01654                 }
01655               betaQ = pow(alpha, expp); 
01656             }
01657         } 
01658       else
01659         { // if genes are equal -> from Deb's implementation, not contained in any paper
01660           betaQ = 1.;
01661         }
01662       
01663       ( *this )[i]   = .5 * ( (y1 + y2) - betaQ * (y2 - y1) );
01664       mate[i]        = .5 * ( (y1 + y2) + betaQ * (y2 - y1) );
01665  
01666       //  -> from Deb's implementation, not contained in any paper
01667       if ( ( *this )[i] < lower[i]) ( *this )[i] = lower[i];
01668       if ( ( *this )[i] > upper[i]) ( *this )[i] = upper[i];
01669       if ( mate[i]      < lower[i]) mate[i]      = lower[i];
01670       if ( mate[i]      > upper[i]) mate[i]      = upper[i];
01671     }
01672   }
01673 }
01674 
01675 // for unconstrained problems
01676 void ChromosomeT< double >::simpleMutatePolynomial(double lower, double upper, 
01677                                                    double nm, double p) {
01678   unsigned i, n = (*this).size();
01679   double delta,  r = 0.;
01680 
01681   for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01682     if(Rng::coinToss(p)) {
01683       r = Rng::uni(0, 1);
01684       if(r < .5) 
01685         delta = pow(2. * r, 1. / (nm + 1.)) - 1;
01686       else
01687         delta = 1 - pow(2. - 2. * r, 1. / (nm + 1.));
01688       (*this)[i] += delta * (upper - lower);
01689     }
01690   }
01691 }
01692 // for unconstrained problems
01693 void ChromosomeT< double >::simpleMutatePolynomial(std::vector<double > &lower, 
01694                                                    std::vector<double > &upper, 
01695                                                    double nm, double p) {
01696   unsigned i, n = (*this).size();
01697   double delta,  r = 0.;
01698 
01699   for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01700     if(Rng::coinToss(p)) {
01701       r = Rng::uni(0, 1);
01702       if(r < .5) 
01703         delta = pow(2 * r, 1. / (nm + 1.)) - 1;
01704       else
01705         delta = 1 - pow(2 - 2 * r, 1. / (nm + 1.));
01706       (*this)[i] += delta * (upper[i] - lower[i]);
01707     }
01708   }
01709 }
01710 // for constrained problems
01711 void ChromosomeT< double >::mutatePolynomial(double lower, 
01712                                              double upper, 
01713                                              double nm, double p) 
01714 {
01715   unsigned i, n = (*this).size();
01716   double delta, deltaQ, expp,  u = 0.;
01717 
01718   for(i = 0; i < n; i++) 
01719     {
01720       if(Rng::coinToss(p)) 
01721         {
01722           u  = Rng::uni(0, 1);
01723        
01724           if ( (*this)[i] <=  lower || (*this)[i] >= upper )
01725             { //  -> from Deb's implementation, not contained in any paper
01726               (*this)[i] = u * ( upper -  lower ) +  lower;
01727 #ifdef DEBUG
01728               std::cerr << "Warning: parameter out of bounds, random resetting ..." << std::endl;
01729 #endif
01730             }
01731           else 
01732             {
01733               // Calculate delta
01734               if( ( (*this)[i] -  lower ) < ( upper - (*this)[i] ) )
01735                 delta = ( (*this)[i] -  lower ) / ( upper -  lower );
01736               else
01737                 delta = ( upper - (*this)[i] ) / ( upper -  lower );
01738 
01739               delta = 1. - delta;
01740               expp  = ( nm + 1. );
01741               delta = pow( delta , expp );
01742               expp  = 1. / expp;
01743 
01744               if(u <= .5) 
01745                 {       
01746                   deltaQ =  2. * u + ( 1 - 2.*u ) * delta;
01747                   deltaQ = pow( deltaQ, expp ) - 1. ;
01748                 }
01749               else
01750                 {
01751                   deltaQ = 2. - 2. * u + 2. * ( u  - .5 ) * delta;
01752                   deltaQ = 1. - pow( deltaQ , expp );
01753                 }
01754               
01755               (*this)[i] += deltaQ * ( upper -  lower );
01756 
01757               //  -> from Deb's implementation, not contained in any paper
01758               if ((*this)[i] < lower) (*this)[i] = lower; 
01759               if ((*this)[i] > upper) (*this)[i] = upper;
01760             }
01761         }
01762     }
01763 }
01764 // for constrained problems
01765 void ChromosomeT< double >::mutatePolynomial(std::vector<double > &lower, 
01766                                              std::vector<double > &upper, 
01767                                              double nm, double p) 
01768 {
01769   unsigned i, n = (*this).size();
01770   double delta, deltaQ, expp,  u = 0.;
01771  
01772 
01773   for(i = 0; i < n; i++) 
01774     {
01775   
01776       if(Rng::coinToss(p)) 
01777         {
01778           u  = Rng::uni(0, 1);
01779           if ( (*this)[i] <= lower[i] || (*this)[i] >= upper[i] )
01780             { //  -> from Deb's implementation, not contained in any paper
01781               (*this)[i] = u * ( upper[i] - lower[i] ) + lower[i];
01782 #ifdef DEBUG
01783               std::cerr << "Warning: parameter out of bounds, random resetting ..." << std::endl;
01784 #endif
01785             }
01786           else 
01787             {
01788               // Calculate delta
01789               if( ( (*this)[i] - lower[i] ) < ( upper[i] - (*this)[i] ) )
01790                 delta = ( (*this)[i] - lower[i] ) / ( upper[i] - lower[i] );
01791               else
01792                 delta = ( upper[i] - (*this)[i] ) / ( upper[i] - lower[i] );
01793 
01794               delta = 1. - delta;
01795               expp  = ( nm + 1. );
01796               delta = pow( delta , expp );
01797               expp  = 1. / expp;
01798 
01799               if(u <= .5) 
01800                 {       
01801                   deltaQ =  2. * u + ( 1 - 2.*u ) * delta;
01802                   deltaQ = pow( deltaQ, expp ) - 1. ;
01803                 }
01804               else
01805                 {
01806                   deltaQ = 2. - 2. * u + 2. * (u  - .5) * delta;
01807                   deltaQ = 1. - pow( deltaQ , expp );
01808                 }
01809               
01810               (*this)[i] += deltaQ * (upper[i] - lower[i]);
01811 
01812               //  -> from Deb's implementation, not contained in any paper
01813               if ((*this)[i] < lower[i]) 
01814                 (*this)[i]=lower[i]; 
01815                 
01816               if ((*this)[i] > upper[i])  
01817                 (*this)[i]=upper[i];
01818         
01819             }
01820         }
01821     }
01822 }
